campaignType.title: Campaign Type
campaignType.description: Select the type of campaign we want to build.

briefMaking.title: Brief Making
briefMaking.description: Within the chatBot we can define the Brief of our campaign

clientInteraction.title: Client Interaction
clientInteraction.description: We will be able to interact with our client to consolidate the objectives of the campaign

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: After closing the campaign, we will be able to see its results and analysis.

registrationAndTracking.title: Registration And Tracking
registrationAndTracking.description: Once the feedback is defined, we can save the results and have a record for future occasions
